translations: v.使糊涂，使冲昏头脑；使迷恋
n.热恋者，迷恋者；被冲昏头脑的人

sentences.sentence: Gleam on 7 colourful ray of lights of fire lotus, the transformation infatuates to depart of brilliance.
sentences.translation: 火莲上七彩的光芒闪耀着，变换着迷离的光彩。

sentences.sentence: In the hall hangs an antithetical couplet, reading Small, the inn enjoys big fame; old, the wine infatuates the world.
sentences.translation: 厅堂正上方挂着一幅对联：小店名气大，老酒醉人多。
